name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Rainstorm
description:
"Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game
In this game , Players need to control their tanks,
through the enemy lines, break the enemy base,
or defeat the enemy tanks

Content
up to 10 kinds of tanks
up to 10 kinds of weapons
up to 20 missions

Features
Main Base Artillery: The Enemy base full picture visible, no matter where the player will continue to fire.
Fog of War: Players ' vision is limited by the fog of war, please be careful to move forward
Bad weather: Rainstorm, flood will keep rising,flooding everything.
